Laminate & Flooring

ONIITO — Handyman in New York installs high-quality laminate and hardwood floors across New York City. We ensure perfect leveling, tight seams, and a stylish matte finish — no gaps, no creaks.

Recent Work

Precise Installation

Every panel is aligned with millimeter precision for a smooth, durable floor finish.

Seamless Transitions

Clean continuity across rooms — no steps, no visual breaks, only neat edges.

Natural Matte Finish

Realistic wood texture with a matte surface — no glossy reflection, comfortable to live with.
